document.full_text: the lawyer for ohio state quarterback terrelle pryor says there is nothing out of the ordinary about the cars the player has driven or purchased and there is a "misperception" about his client.
document.title: lawyer: 'misperception about terrelle'
lines_and_colors: the lawyer for ohio state quarterback terrelle pryor says there is nothing out of the ordinary about the cars the player has driven or purchased and there is a "misperception" about his client.
